Kennedy Consequences for Its Actions At a press briefing following a meeting with the Egyptian Minister of Foreign Affairs, US Secretary of State Hillary Clinton discussed the recent North Korea situation. Hillary Clinton remarked that discussions are going on to add to the consequences that North Korea will face coming out of the latest behavior, with the intent to try to rein in the North Koreans and get them back into a framework where they are once again fulfilling their obligations and moving toward denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
